did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Documents of the Franciscan missionaries from the Queretaro College Archive, Mexico, relating to their operations in northern Mexico 1650-1800

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Pontificio Ateneo Antonianum. Library. Marcellino da Civezza Collection.

did.abstract: Holograph (Spanish) documents, chiefly correspondence. Includes pasted-in typescript (English) Table of Contents, and Historical Note regarding the Civezza Collection.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Documents of the Franciscan missionaries from the Queretaro College Archive, Mexico, relating to their operations in northern Mexico (MS 194). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired as gift of Paul M. Roca, 1980.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Holograph (Spanish) documents, chiefly correspondence. Includes pasted-in typescript (English) Table of Contents, and Historical Note regarding the Civezza Collection.

relatedmaterial.p: Being a part of the 10 volume Civezza Collection at the Library of the Antonianium, Rome, Italy.
Photocopy. Washington, D.C. : The Academy of American Franciscan History.
